Posts.Content: Your mother may feel that natural treatment will be the best route to good pain containment. At stage 4 that is the objective. Actually, I have found that combining both natural and traditional medicine can be very rewarding. do not reject either. Look for all the information you can find on the internet and from physicians that have experience with both. This is a very fast changing area. Consider a medical trial.
Posts.Title: bc Recurrance and Treatment Options
